data.title: 下面哪些值是 falsy?
data.options: {"options":["0, '', undefined","0, new Number(0), '', new Boolean(false), undefined","0, '', new Boolean(false), undefined","All of them are falsy"],"isMulti":false,"answer":[0]}
data.explanation:
只有 6 种 [falsy](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Glossary/Falsy) 值:
- `undefined`
- `null`
- `NaN`
- `0`
- `''` (empty string)
- `false`
`Function` 构造函数, 比如 `new Number` 和 `new Boolean`，是 [truthy](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Glossary/Truthy)。
